publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2819# Karen Whitefield: North Lanarkshire Council - COSLA Award-That the Parliament recognises the devastating effect that anti-social behaviour can have on communities across Scotland; congratulates North Lanarkshire Council on winning the COSLA award for top performing authority in customer focus for its work in establishing an anti-social behaviour taskforce which has dealt with over 300 cases since its inception in January 2001, and believes that this example of good practice should be extended throughout Scotland.
S1M-2819# North Lanarkshire Council - COSLA Award (lodged on 1 March 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2819# North Lanarkshire Council - COSLA Award (lodged on 1 March 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2819# North Lanarkshire Council - COSLA Award (lodged on 1 March 2002) Elaine Smith*
S1M-2819# North Lanarkshire Council - COSLA Award (lodged on 1 March 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2819# North Lanarkshire Council - COSLA Award (lodged on 1 March 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-2819# North Lanarkshire Council - COSLA Award (lodged on 1 March 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2819# North Lanarkshire Council - COSLA Award (lodged on 1 March 2002) Mr Michael McMahon*
S1M-2819# North Lanarkshire Council - COSLA Award (lodged on 1 March 2002) Cathie Craigie*
S1M-2819# North Lanarkshire Council - COSLA Award (lodged on 1 March 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
